parameters.name: EarliestRemediationTime
parameters.description: The earliest remediation time. This parameter is empty by default.

parameters.name: LatestRemediationTime
parameters.description: The latest remediation time. This parameter is empty by default.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of data entries to return.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. If you leave this parameter empty, the query starts from the beginning.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The resource type,

You can obtain the resource type from the **Resource type** column in [Services that work with Resource Group](~~94479~~).

parameters.name: Service
parameters.description:
The ID of the Alibaba Cloud service.

You can obtain the ID from the **Service code** column in [Services that work with Resource Group](~~94479~~).

parameters.name: TargetResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the new resource group.
